flawed_nl_solution:
The adults ate 1/3*120 = <<1/3*120=360/1>>360/1 cookies.
The remaining number of cookies is 120-360/1 = <<120-360/1=-240>>-240 cookies.
If the children divided the cookies equally, each child got -240/4 = <<-240/4=-60>>-60 cookies
#### -60

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 360/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
